at.antSim.graphics.renderer

Class MasterRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.antSim.graphics.renderer.MasterRenderer

  • public class MasterRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
    MasterRenderer handles all of the rendering code in the application.
    Author:
    Flo

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MasterRenderer(at.antSim.graphics.graphicsUtils.Loader loader)
      Constructs a MasterRenderer which manages all rendering and controls sub-renderer classes.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cleanUp()
      Call cleanUp in MasterRenderer before closing the game to free resources.

      Disables back face culling for transparent textures.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MasterRenderer

        public MasterRenderer(at.antSim.graphics.graphicsUtils.Loader loader)
        Constructs a MasterRenderer which manages all rendering and controls sub-renderer classes.
        Parameters:
        loader - - a Loader used to load data into OpenGL

    • Method Detail

      • enableCulling

        public static void enableCulling()
        Enables back face culling for non-transparent textures.
        (prevent rendering of triangles whose normals point away/face away from the camera)

      • disableCulling

        public static void disableCulling()
        Disables back face culling for transparent textures.

      • render

        public void render(java.util.List<at.antSim.graphics.entities.Light> lights,
                   at.antSim.graphics.entities.Camera camera)
        Renders a frame to the screen.
        Parameters:
        lights - - a list of lightsources
        camera - - for creating a viewMatrix

      • processTerrain

        public void processTerrain(at.antSim.graphics.terrains.Terrain terrain)
        Processed a terrain, adding it to the list of used terrains.
        Parameters:
        terrain - - terrain to be processed

      • prepare

        public void prepare()
        Prepares OpenGL to render a frame of the game.
        Should be called every frame.

      • processEntity

        public void processEntity(at.antSim.graphics.entities.Entity entity)
        Sort entity in the entities Hashmap by their correct TexturedModel for more efficient rendering.
        This way, a texture has to be loaded only once and can then be applied for all entities using the same texture.
        Parameters:
        entity - - the Entity to be sorted in

      • cleanUp

        public void cleanUp()
        Call cleanUp in MasterRenderer before closing the game to free resources.

      • getProjectionMatrix

        public org.lwjgl.util.vector.Matrix4f getProjectionMatrix()
